mapper.insert: insert into challenge (chall_id, userid, chall_title, chall_content, chall_category, chall_hits, chall_liked, chall_created, chall_img) values (challenge_chall_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{chall_title}, #{chall_content}, #{chall_category}, 0, 0, sysdate, #{chall_img})
mapper.select: select * from challenge order by chall_id desc
